text:
Roostify | Sr Java SWEs and Architect | San Francisco, CA | Onsite, full-time | competitive salary + benefits + equity

Roostify makes the process of getting a home loan easier and drastically more efficient for borrowers and lenders alike. We have an enterprise SaaS product and our customers are financial institutions.

We're looking for senior java engineers, and an experienced software architect to help lead a platform re-factoring.

https://www.roostify.com/jobs/

Please reach out to Scott Leach (sleach@roostify.com) if you're interested or have questions.
